New Records: Suryakumar Yadav became the second-fastest Indian to the landmark of 2500 T20I runs
Key Match Events: India beat Bangladesh by 133 runs in the third and final game at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad
Sanju Samson scored 111 runs off 47 balls with 11 fours and eight sixes, the second-fastest hundred by an Indian in T20Is
Ravi Bishnoi took 3 wickets for 30 runs in 4 overs
Pre-Game Insights: Gautam Gambhir's message to the Indian team before the series started: 'no one is bigger than the team, no matter you are on 49 or 99, you have to hit the ball out of the field'
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav praised Sanju Samson for playing a selfless knock and heaped praise on the team for their camaraderie and flexibility
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav talked about the importance of players needing to be flexible to build more options in the line-up
